meanings.definition: The practice of driving in a way that maximizes fuel efficiency.
meanings.sent1: Hypermiling can help save money on gas by using smart driving techniques.
meanings.sent2: I learned about hypermiling from a friend who always gets great gas mileage.
meanings.sent3: The hypermiling expert won the fuel efficiency competition with ease.
meanings.sent4: She was a hypermiling wizard, gliding down the road like a fuel-saving magician.
meanings.sent5: The art of hypermiling is like a secret weapon for eco-conscious drivers.

meanings.definition: A person who engages in hypermiling techniques to increase gas mileage.
meanings.sent1: My dad is a hypermiling enthusiast and loves to share his tips for better gas mileage.
meanings.sent2: The hypermiling community is full of people who care about the environment.
meanings.sent3: The hypermiling champion proudly displayed their trophy for all to see.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the hypermiling queen among her friends.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a hypermiling expert takes dedication and practice.

meanings.definition: To hypermile, or drive in a fuel-efficient manner.
meanings.sent1: I always hypermile on long road trips to make the most of my gas tank.
meanings.sent2: He decided to hypermile his way to work to see if he could improve his MPG.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that he was hypermiling his way through traffic to save on gas.
meanings.sent4: She hypermiled through the city streets like a pro, conserving fuel at every turn.
meanings.sent5: Hypermiling requires patience and a keen eye on the road ahead.
